comments:
Description:
Edit XML dataset in attached file will throw ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
Build number:2.1.2.v20061213, 2.2.0.v20061213

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached file in bug #121403.
2. Modify xml data source's path to the folder where contains Test.xml file.
3. Edit xml dataset

Expected result:
No Exception.

Actual result:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1

Error log:
Log in 2.1.2 build
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1

The bug uses a report which is created in the very beginning stage of XML driver. At that time the XML driver?s accompany model storage structure was not stable and was greatly changed after a short duration. And we will not do backward compatibility support to it.(When we decided to change the model storage structure of naive XML driver we've decided that do not support the backward compatibility of it).
